description: Under the arcades of a piazza named after Michele Ferrero, this restaurant has a simple, modern ambience with walls covered with wine bottles, as well as friendly, efficient female staff. The beautifully prepared Piedmontese cuisine is showcased on an à la carte and a tasting menu, accompanied by an impressive selection of quality wine.
